name: Super Hero Girl Beauty DressUp: Frenzy Games Free
name_original: Super Hero Girl Beauty DressUp: Frenzy Games Free
description:
Create your own Superhero Girl!
Save the world while looking good!

Super Hero Monster Girl Dressup is a dress-up game that lets you create your very own personal Female Superhero.
Make her look the strongest and fiercest by choosing bold colors.
Let the world know that she is one of the good guys ready to save anyone whoís in need!
Add some dash of colors and ingenious design to create a strong and attractive superhero!

What are her powers?
How strong is your superhero?
Will she reach the ends of the universe to rescue those who are in need of help?
How fast can she run?
How far can she fly?

Dress up your very own Monster Girl superhero from head to toe!
From head protection to super accessories,
Prepare your superhero suit, and add a glamorous boot!
Are you and your superhero girl ready to face the evils of the world?

Faster than a speeding bullet, fierce as lightning and as powerful as thunder!
A character so magnificent and full of wonder!
Let the superhero within you decide!
Mix and match and let the colors collide!

This game is free to play and for all ages!
In-app purchases available.
Donít forget to give us a good rating in the App Store!
